channel.title: Nsf on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Nsf on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Nintendo Still Rocks
item.description: Hey all, Ernie here with another piece from David Buck, who’s currently in the midst of following his Nintendo muse. Feel free to follow along with him! Today in Tedium: Gamers of a certain age may remember the opening notes of Super Mario Bros as well—or perhaps better than—any other song from their childhoods. As the pack-in title for the original Nintendo Entertainment System, the game was likely the first exposure to video games many of us had outside of arcades and Atari.
